AdWeek - Jollibee's Chicken Ads Look So Tasty, Other Billboards Can't Resist!

Sep 29, 2022

The opening of Jollibee’s Times Square flagship store in New York City was monumental! And what better way to capture it than on a billboard in the heart of the city. Check out AdWeek's article on the OOH campaign that had other billboards reaching out for Chickenjoy!
